client.py

Creates a Client on the MQTT Protocol to communicate with Master

Client generates information to be sent to the Master when it’s to be requested. The communication is done through the MQTT Protocol with InfluxDB.

client.check_duplicate_timestamp_unused()[source]

Checks if client’s DB has any duplicate timestamp value

client.clear_clientDB_data()[source]

Clears every value from client’s DB.

client.influxDB_terminate()[source]

Exit functions relative to influx database

client.init_logging_config()[source]

Creates the logging file for the current clientID file in logs folder

client.mathematical_calculation()[source]

Calculation of PI using Leibniz’s formula

Objective of this function is to aid in adding cost to the generate data thread used by Client.

client.mqtt_init(client)[source]

Connects to Broker and initializes protocols

client.mqtt_terminate(client)[source]

Calls the terminated functions of Client related to MQTT protocol

client.on_connect(client, userdata, message, return_code)[source]

MQTT connect protocol

@param client:

the client instance for this callback

@param userdata:

the private user data as set in Client() or userdata_set()

@param message:

response message sent by the broker

@param return_code:

the connection result

0: Connection successful

1: Connection refused – incorrect protocol version

2: Connection refused – invalid client identifier

3: Connection refused – server unavailable

4: Connection refused – bad username or password

5: Connection refused – not authorised

6-255: Currently unused.

client.on_disconnect(client, userdata, rc)[source]

Logs if any disconnect happened during execution of the program

client.on_message(client, userdata, message)[source]

Receives the messages that are published through the broker

client.save_thread_timestamp_intervals_csv()[source]

Writes the saved elapsed timestamp from generating_data() thread to clientID.csv

client.send_client_data_to_master()[source]

Send Client’s DB data to Master’s DB through influxDB

client.store_welding_generation_DB(new_counter)[source]

Writes the generated information to the client’s DB.

client.welding_data_generation_simulation()[source]

Generates the welding values with its assigned timestamps to be inserted in the DB.

client.welding_workflow()[source]

Thread in charge of the generate data generation loop

Runs the welding data generation function several times before writing the all the generated data through store welding generation thread. Loop of program ends when MAX_CYCLE_LIMIT is reached.
